general.description:
One of the recent Irilia colonies, Irilia-15 is a desert world quite akin to Irilia itself, with a remarkable well-moonedness. Thus, its three moons have been named for their Great Irilia counterparts.
Still quite a backyards place, it nonetheless keeps attracting a growing pool of confident settlers, sure that a well-mooned planet such as this is a promise of fortune.
general.bar: Eager settlers and hardened desert-dwelling natives, with quite a large number of Thiskai
